p: Infectious diseases are serious global health problems as they are often difficult to control, manage or eradicate. COVID-19 pandemic is a classic example of such problems that has devastated the whole world. Lack of new drugs as well as resistance to available anti-infective drugs, particularly antibiotics, have made these diseases difficult to treat ( World Health Organization, 2020). In fact, antibiotic resistance is one of the prevalent threats to global health today. Therefore, discovery of effective and safe antibiotics has become a global priority.
